faqs.question: What is Bloggies Viral Engine?
faqs.answer: Bloggies Viral Engine is a platform that helps content creators amplify their reach through strategic content distribution and promotional tools.

faqs.question: How do credits work?
faqs.answer: Credits are the currency within our platform. They can be earned through various activities or purchased, and they allow you to unlock premium features and promotional opportunities.

faqs.question: What are raffle entries?
faqs.answer: Raffle entries give you a chance to win prizes in our periodic giveaways. The more entries you have, the better your chances of winning.

faqs.question: How do I earn credits?
faqs.answer: Credits can be earned by referring friends, creating quality content, engaging with the community, or through special promotional events.

faqs.question: Can I opt out of the service?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can opt out at any time through the opt-out page. Note that opting out will take effect after a 45-day processing period.

faqs.question: Are there any fees to use the service?
faqs.answer: Basic services are free, but premium features require credits, which can be purchased if you choose not to earn them through platform activities.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team at support@bloggiesviralengine.com or through the contact form on our website.
